DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine choline bitartrate administer daily child prenatal alcohol exposure , age 2.5 5 , potential treatment brain development cognitive functioning .
DOC.brief_title: Postnatal Choline Supplementation Children With Prenatal Alcohol Exposure
DOC.criteria: Available parent legal guardian capable participate informed consent process Documented history heavy prenatal alcohol exposure ( selfreport , social service record , adoption record ) presence facial dysmorphology characteristic FASD Evidence cognitive deficit least one neurocognitive domain History neurological condition ( ex . epilepsy , cerebral palsy , traumatic brain injury ) History medical condition know affect brain function History neurodevelopmental disorder ( ex . autism , syndrome ) History low birthweight ( < 1500 gram ) History prenatal exposure drug alcohol , nicotine , caffeine
